snippet.title: Time Flies Like An Arrow
snippet.description:
Time Flies Like An Arrow is the game I developed for the playdate as part of https://itch.io/jam/playjam-4. The theme was "Your Time is Up". The original PJ4 game is available for free at https://ianharrowergames.itch.io/time-flies-like-an-arrow-pj4. This is a fleshed out, complete version of that PlayJam game.

https://ianharrowergames.itch.io/time-flies-like-an-arrow
https://ianharrowergames.com/
